meanings.sent1: She boughten a new dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: I boughten some flowers for my mom's birthday.
meanings.sent3: He boughten a ticket to the concert but forgot the date!
meanings.sent4: The idea of happiness cannot be boughten with money.
meanings.sent5: The joy she felt when she boughten the puppy was priceless.

meanings.sent1: The boughten shoes were on sale at the store.
meanings.sent2: I prefer boughten furniture over handmade items.
meanings.sent3: The boughten cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile widened as she held the boughten necklace.
meanings.sent5: The boughten car was a great deal for its price.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she boughten a new phone.
meanings.sent2: They boughten groceries for the week.
meanings.sent3: The kids boughten toys with their allowance.
meanings.sent4: The traveler boughten souvenirs from every country visited.
meanings.sent5: The farmer boughten seeds for the upcoming planting season.
